DO YOU WANT TO BE A BROKER?

Easy way to buy and make auctions with bitcoins.
If you win, we win!

DO YOU WANT TO BE A BIDDER?

Easy way to take part in bitcoin auctions.
If you win, we win!

Previous Next

About this project

We are going to develop a trade and auction platform.
The whole idea is to “play” around with bitcoins and build a platform for buying and selling them. The service we would like to offer consists of giving our clients access to the server so that they are able to trade with bitcoins. Our platform will charge users an amount of 0.1% of the transactions they perform.

About us

We are TecnoCampus software engineering students.
